entry.title: Effective teaching notes
entry.content:
Recently I was reading a book Clinical Supervision and Teacher Development

The following are summary notes of Chapter 3 Using clinical supervision to promote effective teaching.
1. Characteristics of Good Teaching in Students' Mind?
Niss(Nice)
* Nice(respect, patient and easy to get along with)
* Interesting(makes subject interesting and fun with students engaged)
* Sense of humor(tell jokes and smiles a lot)
* Sensitive to students' need( Listent to students' question and make changes to help students learn )

  1. Teacher characteristics associated with gain in students' academic achievement?
    Creati
  2. Clarity
  3. Raise Variety(of materials, methods, question types and levels)
  4. Enthusiasm
  5. avoid harsh criticism
  6. Task-oriented

  7. Indirect teaching style

  8. Substantive interaction that increase students' at-task time:
    Equal

  9. Explain(content to students)
  10. questioning
  11. using feedback
  12. assistance
  13. list the steps or task(chunlei added)
